article_title: After Scalia's Death, 2016 Election Is About the Supreme Court, Stupid
article_text:

twitter.description: The death of Justice Antonin Scalia, which has suddenly reduced the conservatives’ solid 5-4 majority on the Supreme Court to an impotent 4-4 impasse, has exposed and amplified what were always t...
twitter.title: Election 2016: It’s the Supreme Court, Stupid.

article_metadata.keywords: antonin scalia, bernie sanders, donald trump, 2016 elections, u.s. supreme court, supreme court, trump

article_metadata.description: This is what Antonin Scalia's death teaches us about Bernie Sanders, Donald Trump, and the significance of the 2016 presidential election.
